typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ID as string,
		EmpName as string,
		EmpCNTRY as string,
		Deptid as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source
source keyGenerate(output(Datakey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['surrogate.xlsx'],
	mapColumn(
		Datakey,
		ID,
		EmpName,
		EmpCNTRY,
		Deptid,
		Gender
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink
